answers.answer: Its not bad at all I just had mine last week I got the fruit punch and she gave me 5 min. To drink it I drunk it all in like 2 it was good to me maybe because I was hungry n thirsty lol but everyone is different youll have to see for yourself

It doesn't taste bad but u can't drink anything after u drink it! I seen some peeps on here say there doc office gives them flavor choices but mine doesnt! Just orange and it's super cold so it makes it easier!  Unless they tell u to fast just do ur normal routine!  It's a important test and a lot of ladies r like "how can I pass, and what r some tips" I don't think there r and if u have it...it's best to know cause it Can cause major health problems for ur baby when it born I had gd and my daughter stayed in the nicu for 11 days and she was my first I didn't know what to do with myself much less for her! Good luck and think positive!

question: I'm a ftm and I have to take my gestational diabetes test within the next month. I have the drink but I'm wondering what it tastes like and what are some stories about it? I've seen some here where they said they couldn't keep it down. What causes some moms to not be able to keep it down?
